thread.title: Photo of Ivanka Trump sitting in president's chair prompts mixed reaction
thread.title_full: Photo of Ivanka Trump sitting in president's chair prompts mixed reaction

author: Elianna Lev
title: Photo of Ivanka Trump sitting in president's chair prompts mixed reaction
text:
Ivanka Trump shared a picture on Monday showing her sitting in the president’s chair. More A photo of Ivanka Trump sitting in the president’s chair is creating a storm of activity on social media. America’s first daughter shared the picture on her social media accounts. It shows her sitting behind the Oval Office desk, flanked by her father, U.S. President Donald Trump, and Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau. She captioned it: “A great discussion with two world leaders about the importance of women having a seat at the table!” The post sparked a frenzy on Twitter. Critics said Ivanka hadn’t earned the right to sit behind the desk. @IvankaTrump Only one world leader at that table & it isn't @POTUS or his daughter 
— Alexander L. King (@1101LittleOne) February 14, 2017 Women should have a seat at the table because they earned it and/or were elected to it. Not because Daddy brought them to work @IvankaTrump 
— Susan Bell Flavin (@susanbellflavin) February 14, 2017 Oh isn't that cute, take your daughter to work day. Photo of Ivanka Trump sitting in president's chair. https://t.co/WFXA3TiJGO 
— Richard Shay (@chelanwine) February 14, 2017 @IvankaTrump Did silver spoon daddy threaten to cut off trade to Canada if Trudeau didn't agree to this picture? 
— moon island (@islandinthemoon) February 14, 2017 . @IvankaTrump The Oval Office should not be a prop for the president's daughter
